channel.title: unreal-engine on voithos.io
channel.description: Recent content in unreal-engine on voithos.io

item.title: Slack Shenanigans
item.description: A while back, I encountered a subtle bug (which of course feels obvious in hindsight) involving a tree traversal and a hash map used for intermediate information. At the time, I had lost the better part of the day to the issue, but it actually led me to some interesting conclusions and so I thought it’d be fun to try to present it here in a somewhat generalized and simplified way.
